attributes.action: support the Human Shrub's campaign to protect the sacred land which is the Blue Peter Garden.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the current BBC building is listed the garden isn't protected despite the fact its the burial ground for George the tortoise.  This land should be given listed status to protect it for the future.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
